title: A Closer Look at the Conference Championships | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 386)
description:
The Rams look to avoid a repeat of their last matchup against New Orleans (0:30), and Bill Belichick and Andy Reid square off in a battle of this generation’s best coaches (22:30).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark
